entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
